level.text: The appropriate fee as established by the Director must accompany an application for registration or renewal.
Renewal of Registration – four hundred dollars ($400);
Application based upon initial application of another State – four hundred dollars ($400);
Application based upon renewal application of another State – four hundred dollars ($400); and
Application fee to be included with the registration fees listed in (a) through (d) above – one hundred dollars ($100).
The Director may amend these fees via the fee schedule located in Chapter 35 of this title.
